input.sentences: i spent all day out on the farm .
i could see the house in the distance .
there was a lot of land out here .
when i got back to the house i was very hungry .
output.sentences: The day was spent on the farm.
It was hard to see the farm house from here.
At a distance I can see the farm house.
There is a lot of land on the farm.
I'm getting hungry and going to the house for dinner.
